about.title: Staking.Reimagined.
about.text:
Stkr is a decentralized protocol 
and platform that combines staking and DeFi, implementing elements from traditional staking with non-custodial staking, Micropools and decentralized governance.

stage-6.title:
Create Your
Staking Pools
stage-6.text: To provide users with assurance that your resources will provide consistently high uptime and performance, we require a deposit of Ankr tokens to be made. Note that if you provide a good service, these tokens will also earn you additional rewards, however if you fail to meet a minimum level of service, your deposited tokens will be used to compensate any losses incurred by Micropool participants.

stage-7.note: The process might take a while
